[Oportunidade 1]
Oportunidade: Senior Machine Learning Engineer

Sobre a vaga
No software farms and no part-time jobs at the moment. We build our software in-house.

Looking for a Machine Learning Engineer with interest in product. As we are an early-stage startup, the range of projects is quite broad, so fluency and willingness to go across the stack to solve problems are a big plus. Experience with system design is also a plus.

Minimum qualifications:
Fluency in Python
Experience with System Design
Fluency in English
Experience building production machine learning systems
Experience with Machine Learning Research
Experience creating backend systems in Python

Projects include:
Developing and Serving Machine Learning models
Optimizing ML models i.e. fine-tuning, prompt engineering
Data preparation and cleaning
Maintaining our Python backend

At Findly, we created a culture where developers have complete ownership of the projects and tools they build, from prototyping to deploying it on prod.

Plataforma de Ingest√£o: Respons√°vel por garantir a ingest√£o eficiente dos dados, desde suas fontes at√© a camada bronze do Data Lake. Nossos principais clientes s√£o desenvolvedores ingerindo dados de seus microservi√ßos e fornecedores;
